Name: The Treasure of the Dragon
About the game: Dragon's treasure is a strategy game that combines CARDS and banners. Players gain resources to upgrade their classes and equipment by fighting players or computer AI on different levels of the map, and finally defeat the dragon leader to get the legendary treasure
